pages.text: The $(item)Heart of the Sea$() can be obtained from a $(l:world/structures#treasure)$(thing)Buried Treasure$(). $(br2)The location is marked with a noticeable red $(l)X$() on a buried $(item)Treasure Map$(), which is found in $(l:world/structures#ruin)$(thing)Ocean Ruins$() and $(l:world/structures#shipwreck)$(thing)Shipwrecks$(). $(br2)Feeding $(item)Raw Cod$() or $(item)Raw Salmon$() to a $(l:creatures/aquatic_animal-dolphin)$(thing)Dolphin$() causes them to swim toward the nearest structure.
$(br)The heart be used to craft a $(l:rare/conduit)$(item)Conduit$().
